participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, always looking for beauty in the ordinary and deeply committed to family.
participant_1.background: My home is in Pittsburgh, where I am able to find inspiration and capture the beauty of the city through my camera. I grew up in Alabama. My favorite jello is the blue one. I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right. I saw a solar eclipse when I was 8 years old.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Energetic and optimistic, always seeking new experiences and dedicated to supporting her community.
participant_2.background: My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites. I try to keep myself young by trying new things and surrounding myself with positive people. I love to listen to the Avert Brothers while working on cases for the federal court. I had 128 tackles last year. I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop.

content.text: Hello! I'm from Pittsburgh PA, where do you live?
I'm from California but I live in DC now.
I got a job as a lawyer here.
Oh cool! I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
That's awesome! I love my son and I volunteer in his boy scout troop.
Nice! I love scuba diving and I also like to watch movie reviews. What's your favorite movie?
I think my favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption.
That's one of my favorites too! What was your favorite thing about it?
I love the story of hope and redemption.
That's a great choice! I also love the soundtrack.
